job_history.work_description: Designed and implemented daily lesson plans based on Oak Hills School District Visual Arts Curriculum, National Visual Arts Standards and Ohio Visual Arts Standards. Evaluated student artwork based on stated criteria. Displayed student artwork throughout the school building.

Designed and implemented daily lesson plans based on Oak Hills School District Visual Arts Curriculum, National Visual Arts Standards and Ohio Visual Arts Standards. Initiated and arranged a school field trip to Cincinnati Art Museum and Contemporary Arts Center as an extension of classroom learning. Assessed student artwork based on stated criteria. Displayed student artwork throughout the school building. Planned and installed student sculpture exhibit at Delhi Public Library.

Design and implement daily lesson plans for grades 1-8 based on National Visual Arts Standards and Ohio Visual Arts Standards. Teach interdisciplinary units with grade level teachers that integrate reading, language arts, cultural studies and technology with art production. Evaluate student performance based on stated criteria and prepare grades for quarterly report cards. Display student artwork throughout the school building including biannual all-school art exhibits held during Catholic Schools Week Open House and annual Fine Arts Festival.

interests: SWOAEA Art Workshops Summer Teacher Institute
Cincinnati Art Museum Evenings for Educators
Cincinnati Contemporary Art Center Art Exhibitions & AWARDS
Studio San Guiseppe Gallery Pendleton Arts Center

skills.name: Lesson Planning
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience designing and implementing daily lesson plans based on various curricula and standards, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Art Education
skills.explanation: Has a strong educational background in Art Education, with both Bachelor's and Master's degrees, and has applied this knowledge in teaching roles, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Teaching
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience teaching students of various grade levels, demonstrating a strong proficiency in teaching and classroom management.

skills.name: Curriculum Development
skills.explanation: Has experience developing and implementing curricula based on National Visual Arts Standards and Ohio Visual Arts Standards, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Art Production
skills.explanation: Has experience with art production, as evident from the various art exhibits and workshops mentioned, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Event Planning
skills.explanation: Has experience planning and installing student sculpture exhibits and arranging school field trips, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Although there is no direct mention of leadership roles, the experience in teaching and event planning suggests some level of leadership skills, but not extensive.

skills.name: Graphic Design
skills.explanation: Has an educational background in Graphic Design, but there is no mention of its application in recent roles, indicating some practical experience but not extensive.

skills.name: Painting
skills.explanation: Has an educational background in Painting, but there is no mention of its application in recent roles, indicating some practical experience but not extensive.
